name: Workflow
tagline: alfred workflows: timestamp convertor, get ip address.
body:
# workflow
Alfred workflows, including:

1. timestamp convertor, convert millis to time string. 
[[Download](https://raw.github.com/ishare/workflow/master/TimestampConvertor.alfredworkflow)]

2. get your ip address.
[[Download](https://raw.github.com/ishare/workflow/master/IP.alfredworkflow)]


## Usage:
ts [now or timeInMillis or timeInSeconds]

![Screenshot](https://github.com/ishare/workflow/raw/master/screenshot/screenshot_1.jpg)
![Screenshot](https://github.com/ishare/workflow/raw/master/screenshot/screenshot_2.jpg)
![Screenshot](https://github.com/ishare/workflow/raw/master/screenshot/screenshot_3.jpg)

type `ip` to get your ip:

![Screenshot](https://github.com/ishare/workflow/raw/master/screenshot/screenshot_4.jpg)
